faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: See the most common questions of new traders answered here.

q1.question: How Does EliteScalper Work?
q1.answer:
EliteScalper is an advanced Expert Advisor designed to identify and execute high-potential scalping opportunities with precision. Utilizing sophisticated algorithms, it analyzes market conditions and filters out noise to focus on setups with a high probability of success.

With a robust risk management framework, EliteScalper ensures that every trade aligns with your predefined risk parameters, protecting your investment while optimizing profit potential. Experience the power of automated trading with EliteScalper and take your trading strategy to the next level.

q2.question: Does the Software Work on MT4 / MT5?
q2.answer: Yes, EliteScalper works on both MT5 & MT4.

q3.question: Are there any risks associated with using the EA?
q3.answer: As with any trading activity, there is always a risk of loss. Automated trading solutions can help mitigate some risks by employing consistent and tested strategies, but they cannot completely eliminate the inherent risks associated with trading in financial markets. We recommend a cautious approach and thorough understanding of the risks before starting.

q4.question: Will I get guidance on how to set up the EA correctly?
q4.answer: Yes, after purchase, tutorial & instructions will be sent to your email.

q5.question: Can the EA pass prop firm evaluations?
q5.answer: The EA can indeed pass prop firm evaluations with careful management, planning, and optimization. Backtesting setfiles provides insight into expected performance under challenge conditions, allowing for risk adjustment to meet prop firm rules and targets. After identifying a balanced set that complies with these rules, itâ€™s advisable to live demo test the settings for about 3-5 days for further validation. This process helps ensure that the live test results align with backtesting outcomes, making it a viable strategy to start the challenge with confidence.

q6.question: Can it be used on a funded account?
q6.answer: The EliteScalper is designed for both challenge and funded accounts. Once you secure funding, it's advisable to lower your risk exposure while leveraging the EA's impressive win rate to effectively grow your account.
